query.sfwSql: SELECT SUM(XYZ) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS XYZ FROM Hours A WHERE (HoursReported > 0 OR HoursWorked > 0) AND SSN=@SSN UNION select COUNT(*) AS XYZ from CPASPre95_11222011 B where HRSACT > 0 and MKEY=@SSN UNION select COUNT(*) AS XYZ from Pension_PreMerger_Annual_History C where Credited_Hours > 0 and SSN=@SSN UNION select COUNT(*) AS XYZ from HPTransactions D where Hours > 0 and SSN=@SSN )AS TEMP
